Client.Name: Shanghai Small Ants E-commerce Co., Ltd.

Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Founded in 2014, Shanghai Little Small Ants E-commerce Co. is dedicated to providing excellent e-commerce solutions and services to our customers. As an innovative company, our goal is to help companies achieve online sales growth and brand enhancement through digital technology and quality user experience.

Headquartered in Shanghai, China's economic and financial center, we are uniquely positioned to better access market dynamics and customer needs. We have a team of highly qualified professionals covering a wide range of areas including marketing, data analytics, technology development and customer service to ensure that we are able to provide comprehensive support to our clients.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Product Information includes product name, description, price, quantity in stock, pictures, categorization, etc. to ensure that customers have access to accurate product information and data backup.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We're used to using Lotus to prepare data.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, South America, Europe
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives, Lotus built-in data transfer
